definition: eucommia (a kind of rubber tree)
surname Du
birchleaf pear (tree)/to stop/to prevent/to restrict
second month of a season/middle/intermediate/second amongst brothers
surname Zhong

sentences.english: The procedure of DuzhongCola was determined on the basis of results of single factor experiments.
sentences.chinese: 研究了利用杜仲叶生产杜仲可乐的工艺。

sentences.english: The procedure of DuzhongCola was determined on the basis of results of single factor experiments.
sentences.chinese: 研究了利用杜仲叶生产杜仲可乐的工艺。

sentences.english: Genetic Parameter Estimation and Analysis on Improvement Effect of High-Yielding Guttapercha Clones Associate with Eucommia ulmoides Oliv.
sentences.chinese: 杜仲高产胶无性系遗传参数估计与改良效果分析。

sentences.english: Then, the material obtained after removing cellulose was utilized to extract guttapercha.
sentences.chinese: 脱除纤维素后的杜仲材料用石油醚为溶剂提取杜仲胶。

sentences.english: Then, the material obtained after removing cellulose was utilized to extract guttapercha.
sentences.chinese: 脱除纤维素后的杜仲材料用石油醚为溶剂提取杜仲胶。

sentences.english: The Difference and Its Pertinence Analysis of the Guttapercha Content in Organs of Eucommia ulmoides Oliv.
sentences.chinese: 杜仲不同器官含胶率的差异及其相关性分析。

sentences.english: The eucommia leaves are processed for later use.
Objective:Overview the development of modern preparation of Eucommia ulmoides Oliver.
sentences.chinese: 目的对杜仲现代炮制的研究进展作一综述。

sentences.english: The sedative and hypnotic effects of ethyl acetate extracts of eucommia male flowers were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究杜仲雄花乙酸乙酯提取物的抗惊厥作用。

sentences.english: Conclusion Scrape the coarsed cortex is necessary of Eucommia ulmodies processing in planting.
sentences.chinese: 结论杜仲在原产地加工中“去粗皮”是必要的。

sentences.english: Pinoresinol diglucoside (PDG) has been known as the most important component contributing to descending blood pressure in Eucommia ulmoides Oliver.
sentences.chinese: 松脂醇二葡萄糖苷是杜仲中主要的降血压成分。

sentences.english: This paper investigated effects of lowering blood pressure and acute toxicity of Viscum coloratum (Kom. ) Nakai and Eucommia ulmoides Oliv.
sentences.chinese: 研究了槲寄生和杜仲的降血压作用和急性毒性。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the extraction and purification of chlorogenic acid from leaves of Eucommia ulmoides.
sentences.chinese: 对杜仲叶绿原酸的提取进行研究。

sentences.english: The extraction of eucommia seed oil was studied using eucommia seeds as raw material and supercritical CO2 as solvent.
sentences.chinese: 以杜仲籽为原料，超临界CO2为溶剂萃取杜仲籽油。

sentences.english: The extraction of eucommia seed oil was studied using eucommia seeds as raw material and supercritical CO2 as solvent.
sentences.chinese: 以杜仲籽为原料，超临界CO2为溶剂萃取杜仲籽油。

sentences.english: An HPLC method for the quantitative determination of chlorogenic acid in Eucommia leaf was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 采用高效液相色谱法测定杜仲叶中绿原酸的含量。

definition: Epimedium, genus of herbaceous flowering plant, cultivated in the Far East as aphrodisiac/also called barrenwort or horny goatweed (said to resemble crushed goat's testicles)
King Solomon's seal (plant of genus Polygonatum)
dodder (Cuscuta sinensis, a parasitic vine with seeds used in medicine)
Angelica sinensis
schizandra (Schisandra chinensis)/Magnolia vine
huangqi/milk vetch root (used in TCM)/Astragalus membranaceus or Astragalus mongholicus
golden eye-grass (Curculigo orchioides)/Curculigo rhizome (used in TCM)
Achyranthes bidentata (root used in Chinese medicine)
Salvia miltiorrhiza
chuanxiong rhizome
Wolfiporia extensa (a wood-decay fungus)/fu ling/tuckahoe
Gastrodia elata (botany)
the rhizome of large-headed atractylodes (Atractylodes macrocephaia)
root of herbaceous peony (Paeonia lactiflora), used in TCM
Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
tuber of the kudzu vine (Pueraria lobata), used in Chinese medicine
